summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1994, for the improvement of Thirty-second Avenue South, from Irving Street to the south line of All Around View Addition to the City of Seattle, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by the constructing of sewers and side sewer connections, together with all necessary manholes and flush tanks, under Ordinance No. 20399, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
